unnormalised: Regarding the implementation of the PM Poshan scheme, reports indicate that only 65% of eligible schools have been successfully integrated as of 01/08/2024. Further, a recent study showed that despite the Rs. 12,000 crore allocation, the actual nutritional benefits reaching students remain suboptimal in some regions.
normalised: Regarding the implementation of the P-M Poshan scheme, reports indicate that only sixty five percent of eligible schools have been successfully integrated as of first august two thousand and twenty four. Further, a recent study showed that despite the rupee twelve billion allocation, the actual nutritional benefits reaching students remain suboptimal in some regions.
